clauses.title: Termination
clauses.summary: 90 days notice period required for contract termination.

clauses.title: Liability Cap
clauses.summary: Total liability limited to 12 months' fees paid.

clauses.title: Data Protection
clauses.summary: GDPR compliance required for all data processing.

insights.message: Liability cap excludes data breach costs and could expose organization to significant risk.
Contract auto-renews unless cancelled 60 days before expiry date.
Standard termination clause provides adequate notice period.

evidence.snippet: Total liability shall be limited to the total amount of fees paid by Customer in the twelve (12) months preceding the claim.
Either party may terminate this Agreement upon ninety (90) days written notice.
This Agreement shall automatically renew for successive one-year terms unless terminated by either party.

clauses.title: Service Availability
clauses.summary: Network uptime guarantee of 99.5% with limited remedies.

clauses.title: Unlimited Liability
clauses.summary: No liability cap for service provider negligence.

clauses.title: Exclusive Remedy
clauses.summary: Service credits are the sole remedy for outages.

insights.message: Unlimited liability exposure for provider negligence creates significant risk.
Service credits may not adequately compensate for business losses.
99.5% uptime allows for significant downtime per year.

evidence.snippet: Provider's liability for negligence shall not be limited or excluded.
Customer's sole remedy for service outages shall be service credits as defined herein.
Provider guarantees 99.5% network availability measured monthly.
